author: dbertoni
msg: Make sure XalanOutputStreamPrintWriter does not mix wide and narrow character writes without flushing as required.  Fixes Bugzilla 22197.

msg: New, experimental code for Linux. Needs to be updated to be POSIX-compliant.

msg: Make sure memory is deallocated by the appropriate memory manager.  Fixes Bugzilla 22196.

msg: Fixed a bug where deleteDocument() would not delete a new wrapper document.
